Class Standard

java.lang.Object
model.card.Card
model.card.standard.Standard
public class Standard extends Card
Represents a standard playing card with a specific rank and suit. Inherits common card properties and methods from the abstract Card class.

  • Constructor Summary

    • Standard

      public Standard(String name, String description, int rank, Suit suit, BoardManager boardManager, GameManager gameManager)
      Constructs a standard playing card.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the card (inherited from Card)
      description - A brief description of the card (inherited from Card)
      rank - The rank of the card
      suit - The suit of the card
      boardManager - The board manager (inherited from Card)
      gameManager - The game manager (inherited from Card)
